projects.name: MDS Application Management System
projects.description: Full-stack admissions platform for UBC's MDS program. Features RBAC with multiple permission levels, normalized PostgreSQL schema adhering to 3NF principles, admin dashboard with CSV/Excel export, and advanced SQL-optimized filtering.

projects.name: E-Commerce Web Application
projects.description: Enterprise e-commerce platform with product catalog, persistent shopping cart, secure authentication using BCrypt, admin dashboard with real-time sales analytics, BLOB storage for images, and ACID-compliant transactions with Docker deployment.

projects.name: DatBase: SQLite Clone
projects.description: RDBMS implementation in C with self-balancing B+ tree indexing (O(log n) search), SQLite-compatible binary format, SQL parser with recursive descent and AST generation, and write-ahead logging (WAL) for ACID compliance and crash recovery.

projects.name: DockerKilo: Text Editor
projects.description: Extended Kilo editor with gap buffer data structure for O(1) insertion/deletion, rope-based text manipulation for large files, and intelligent memory pooling. Achieved 40% performance improvement through profiling and optimization.

projects.name: Network Chatroom
projects.description: Client-server chat application using Java socket programming with TCP/IP protocol. Features multithreaded server with thread pool executor pattern, non-blocking I/O, connection lifecycle management, and graceful error handling.
